title: Ghost Recon Phantoms - Steam Backup v1.1.2
description:
Tom Clancy's Ghost Recon Phantoms is a third-person perspective multiplayer action video game released for Microsoft Windows PCs.

This is a steam backup of the game as on 15-June-20014.
The game's version is 1.1.2.

This is a free-to-play game and can be downloaded freely off on steam, but some people want alternate download options.

For more visit - http://ghost-recon.ubi.com/ghost-recon-phantoms/en-gb/home/

Please seed as long as you can.
Thanks.


------------- TO INSTALL ------------
open steam.
click backup and restore games. (from top menu)
restore a previous backup.
browse to the folder where you downloaded it.
and press next.
choose a location to install the game.
and press finish.
